languages.text: "Если хочешь ей добра, подари каплю совести и страха перед Императором — вот то, в чем она поистине нуждается. Ну а если хочешь порадовать... дай ей какое-нибудь бессмысленное украшение, дорогое и блестящее. Над сердцами вроде ее они имеют магическую власть".

"If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."
languages.original_text: "Если хочешь ей добра, подари каплю совести и страха перед Императором — вот то, в чем она поистине нуждается. Ну а если хочешь порадовать... дай ей какое-нибудь бессмысленное украшение, дорогое и блестящее. Над сердцами вроде ее они имеют магическую власть".

traits.locale_text: "If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

"If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

"If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

"If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

languages.text: «Por su propio bien, yo le infundiría una buena dosis de conciencia y temor al Emperador; es lo que más falta le hace. Pero si lo que pretende es complacerla... regálele algún tipo de joya que sea cara y brille mucho. Tales baratijas ejercen un poder casi mágico sobre corazones como el suyo».
languages.original_text: "If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

traits.locale_text: «Por su propio bien, yo le infundiría una buena dosis de conciencia y temor al Emperador; es lo que más falta le hace. Pero si lo que pretende es complacerla... regálele algún tipo de joya que sea cara y brille mucho. Tales baratijas ejercen un poder casi mágico sobre corazones como el suyo».

languages.text: 「彼女のためを思うのなら、良心と皇帝への畏怖の念を与えること――それこそ彼女が本当に必要としているものだ。だが、彼女を喜ばせたいのなら…高価で光り輝く意味のない宝石を与えるといい。宝飾品は、彼女のような心を持つ者に対して魔法のような力を発揮する」
languages.original_text: "If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女のためを思うのなら、良心と皇帝への畏怖の念を与えること――それこそ彼女が本当に必要としているものだ。だが、彼女を喜ばせたいのなら…高価で光り輝く意味のない宝石を与えるといい。宝飾品は、彼女のような心を持つ者に対して魔法のような力を発揮する」

languages.text: “如果你真的想为她好，就送她一些良知和对帝皇的敬畏吧！这才是她真正需要的东西。但如果你只是想取悦她的话……就送她一些昂贵闪亮，但毫无意义的珠宝吧。这种小玩意对她这样的人，有着神奇般的魔力。”
languages.original_text: "If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

traits.locale_text: “如果你真的想为她好，就送她一些良知和对帝皇的敬畏吧！这才是她真正需要的东西。但如果你只是想取悦她的话……就送她一些昂贵闪亮，但毫无意义的珠宝吧。这种小玩意对她这样的人，有着神奇般的魔力。”

languages.text: « Si vous voulez son bien, inculquez-lui un peu de conscience et une saine crainte de l'Empereur... Voilà ce dont elle a vraiment besoin. Mais si vous souhaitez simplement lui faire plaisir, offrez-lui quelque coûteux bijou clinquant. Les babioles de ce genre ont un pouvoir magique sur les cœurs comme le sien. »
languages.original_text: "If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous voulez son bien, inculquez-lui un peu de conscience et une saine crainte de l'Empereur... Voilà ce dont elle a vraiment besoin. Mais si vous souhaitez simplement lui faire plaisir, offrez-lui quelque coûteux bijou clinquant. Les babioles de ce genre ont un pouvoir magique sur les cœurs comme le sien. »

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr ihr etwas Gutes tun wollt, impft Ihr eine Dosis Gewissen und Furcht vor dem Imperator ein — das ist es, was sie wirklich braucht. Wenn Ihr sie aber erfreuen wollt ... schenkt Ihr bedeutungslosen Schmuck, teuer und glänzend. Solcher Tand übt über Herzen wie das ihre magische Kraft aus."
languages.original_text: "If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr ihr etwas Gutes tun wollt, impft Ihr eine Dosis Gewissen und Furcht vor dem Imperator ein — das ist es, was sie wirklich braucht. Wenn Ihr sie aber erfreuen wollt ... schenkt Ihr bedeutungslosen Schmuck, teuer und glänzend. Solcher Tand übt über Herzen wir das ihre magische Kraft aus."

languages.original_text: "If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

languages.text: "İyiliğini düşünüyorsan biraz vicdan ve İmparator korkusu aşılamalısın. Hakikat bu. Fakat onu memnun etmek istiyorsan... Manasız bir ziynet eşyasıyla bunu başarabilirsin. Pahalı olsun, pırıl pırıl parlasın. Böylesi şeyler onun gibilerin kalbini âdeta büyüler."
languages.original_text: "If you want to do her good, give her a dose of conscience and fear of the Emperor — that is what she truly needs. But if you want to please her... give her some meaningless jewellery, expensive and shiny. Such baubles wield magical power over hearts like hers."

traits.locale_text: "İyiliğini düşünüyorsan biraz vicdan ve İmparator korkusu fena olmaz. Hakikat bu. Fakat onu memnun etmek istiyorsan... manasız bir ziynet eşyasıyla bunu başarabilirsin. Pahalı olsun, pırıl pırıl parlasın. Böylesi şeyler onun gibilerin kalbini âdeta büyüler."
